snippet: “Sahib Biwi Aur Gangster” is a riff on a 1962 Hindi classic, with amorous rapture, political machinations, bloodlettings and (of course) musical sequences.
lead_paragraph: “Sahib Biwi Aur Gangster” is a riff on a 1962 Hindi classic, with amorous rapture, political machinations, bloodlettings and (of course) musical sequences.

headline.main: An Amorous Triangle, Spiced Up by Gunplay
headline.seo: ‘Sahib Biwi Aur Gangster,’ Directed by Tigmanshu Dhulia — Review
